offer_summary.job_description: The position involves online teaching of Python programming to students with the workload being a group of 4-15 students over 32 weeks. The instructor can start with 1-2 groups in the first month and up to 10 groups after 3 months.
requirements: Mastery of Python (algorithms, methods, conditional statements, collections, data structures, OOP)
Experience with Python libraries (EasyGUI, Pillow, Discord.py, aiogram etc.)
Experience creating chatbots for Telegram and Discord, and writing internet applications
Ability to read and quickly understand code written by others (both personally and to effectively help students)
requiered_skills: Experience with various Python libraries and tools
Experience creating chatbots for Telegram and Discord, and writing internet applications
nice_to_have_skills: Ability to work as a freelancer
benefits: Discounts on company products and services
